scalping_strategies.name: Momentum Scalping
scalping_strategies.summary: Rides strong price moves in the direction of momentum.

entry.condition: Enter after a breakout candle closes above resistance (buy) or below support (sell).

exit.condition: Close when momentum slows, RSI overbought/oversold, or MACD divergence.

scalping_strategies.name: Range Trading Scalping
scalping_strategies.summary: Buys at support, sells at resistance within a price range.

entry.condition: Buy near support with bullish confirmation; sell near resistance with bearish confirmation.

exit.condition: Close at mid-range or opposite range boundary; cut loss if price breaks out.

scalping_strategies.name: Breakout Scalping
scalping_strategies.summary: Trades price breaking out of key levels with force.

entry.condition: Enter when price breaks resistance (buy) or support (sell) with strong volume confirmation.

exit.condition: Close when price reaches target or retraces back inside the range.

entry.condition: Buy when price dips below VWAP and starts reversing; sell when price rises above VWAP and weakens.

exit.condition: Close when price returns to VWAP or stalls.

scalping_strategies.name: Mean-Reversion Scalping
scalping_strategies.summary: Trades price snapping back to its average.

entry.condition: Buy when price is below the lower Bollinger Band or RSI is oversold; sell when price is above the upper Bollinger Band or RSI is overbought.
confirmation: Decreasing Volume on last impulse candle

exit.condition: Close when price returns to mean or momentum weakens.

scalping_strategies.name: Opening Range Breakout (ORB) Scalping
scalping_strategies.summary: Trades breakouts from the first minutes of market open.

entry.condition: Buy on a breakout above the range with volume confirmation; sell on a breakdown below.
confirmation: Opening range breakout with above-average volume

exit.condition: Close trade when price stalls, pullback occurs, or ATR target is reached.
